statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.USER_ID DESC) AS ROW_NO , AA.USER_ID , AA.USER_NAME , AA.USER_TYPE , AA.LOGIN_ID , AA.USE_YN , AA.REMARKS , AA.INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.USER_NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , AA.UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.USER_NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME FROM UAA.USERS AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.INS_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.NAME LIKE '%' + #FIND_TEXT# + '%'
AND AA.USER_ID = #USER_ID#
ORDER BY ROW_NO
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO UAA.USERS ( USER_NAME, USER_TYPE, LOGIN_ID, LOGIN_PW, USE_YN, REMARKS, INS_TIME, INS_USER ) VALUES ( #USER_NAME# , #USER_TYPE# , #LOGIN_ID# , PWDENCRYPT(#LOGIN_ID#) , #USE_YN# , #REMARKS# , GETDATE() , #INS_USER# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS USER_ID
statements.update: UPDATE UAA.USERS SET USER_NAME = #USER_NAME# , USER_TYPE = #USER_TYPE# , LOGIN_ID = #LOGIN_ID# , USE_YN = #USE_YN# , REMARKS = #REMARKS# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID#
UPDATE UAA.USERS SET LOGIN_PW = PWDENCRYPT(LOGIN_ID) , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID#
UPDATE UAA.USERS SET LOGIN_PW = PWDENCRYPT(#LOGIN_PW#) , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID#
